text: George L. Radosevich (January 25, 1928 â€“ April 4, 2016) was an American football defensive back. He played for the Baltimore Colts from 1954 through 1956. He played college football at the University of Pittsburgh. He was born in Brentwood, Pennsylvania. Radosevich died of congestive heart failure on April 4, 2016 in Anderson, South Carolina, aged 88. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:Baltimore Colts players Category:American football players Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania
title: George Radosevich
